meanings.definition: A member of the Russian peasant class.
meanings.sent1: The mujiks worked hard in the fields to grow crops.
meanings.sent2: The village was filled with mujiks going about their daily tasks.
meanings.sent3: The mujiks had a dance party after a successful harvest.
meanings.sent4: The unity among the mujiks was as strong as the roots of the tallest tree.
meanings.sent5: The image of the mujiks toiling under the sun stayed with him forever.

meanings.sent1: Many mujiks gathered in the square to discuss important matters.
meanings.sent2: The market was bustling with vendors selling goods to the mujiks.
meanings.sent3: The mujiks decided to start a band and called themselves 'The Peasant Musicians'.
meanings.sent4: The colorful scarves worn by the mujiks fluttered like flags in the wind.
meanings.sent5: The sound of laughter echoed through the village as the mujiks shared stories.
